package2.REs
Class RETools

java.lang.Object
  package2.REs.RETools

public class RETools
extends java.lang.Object

How to load RestrictionEnzyme-Information:

RETools REList = new RETools();

try
{
loadREs loadRE = new loadREs(REList, e, s, r);
}
catch (IOException excp)
{
excp.printStackTrace(System.out);
}

e: emboss_e; r: emboss_r; s: emboss_s
RETools stores all information in static variables, any instance of RETools contains the same information

Author:
kingcarlxx

search4ends

public REgroup search4ends(SequenceDNA overhang,
                           boolean strand,
                           REgroup group)
Searches for Enzyme which will produce the given sticky end, or blunt if overlap is zero.

Parameters:
overhang - Sequence of overhang, upper strand even if overhang is on lower strand
strand - true if overhang is on upper strand of right fragment end, false if overhang is on upper strand of left fragment end
group -
Returns:
